plot: Set on the dark side of Hollywood, B-Movie maven Harry Costas is forced to protect the screen legacy of his wife Helga when a low-life upstart producer threatens to ruin her image.
plot_en: Set on the dark side of Hollywood, B-Movie maven Harry Costas is forced to protect the screen legacy of his wife Helga when a low-life upstart producer threatens to ruin her image.
plot_es: Set on the dark side of Hollywood, B-Movie maven Harry Costas is forced to protect the screen legacy of his wife Helga when a low-life upstart producer threatens to ruin her image.
title: Medium Rare
